chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is an iPhone 13 and it has the above problem:
The phone doesn't charge anymore or only sometimes. Sometimes, only one charging cable works and sometimes none.

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Falsches Produkt erhalten.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The customer sent us an iPhone 13 mini with IMEI: 350971746119252 while we originally sold them an iPhone 13 with IMEI: 357329386278107. We will return the phone back to the customer.

Regards,
KJ

Dear Backcare,

The order will be shipped by DPD. Here is the tracking number : 10084001687238

Regards,
JY

Hello Thomas, You can find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return, please follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item here. 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any existing protective coverings. 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below. To package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product positioned so it won't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification in case the original one gets lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before sending. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care
